name: International Journal on Natural Language Computing
content: International Journal on Natural Language Computing (IJNLC) ISSN: 2278 - 1307 \[Online\]; 2319 - 4111 \[Print\] http://airccse.org/journal/ijnlc/index.html \*\*\* H-index 16, i10-index 25 \*\*\* Scope & Topics Natural Language Processing is a programmed approach to analyze text that is based on both a set of theories and a set of technologies. This forum aims to bring together researchers who have designed and build software that will analyze, understand, and generate languages that humans use naturally to address computers. Topics of interest include but are not limited to, the following • Phonology, Morphology • Chunking/Shallow Parsing • Parsing/Grammatical Formalisms • Semantic Processing • Lexical Semantics • Ontology • Linguistic Resources • Statistical and Knowledge based methods • POS tagging • Discourse • Paraphrasing/Entailment/Generation • Machine Translation • Information Retrieval • Text Mining • Information Extraction • Question Answering • Dialog Systems • Spoken Language Processing • Speech Recognition and Synthesis Paper Submission Authors are invited to submit papers for this journal through E-mail: ijnlcjournal@airccse.org. Submissions must be original and should not have been published previously or be under consideration for publication while being evaluated for this Journal. Important Dates • Submission Deadline : August 22, 2020 • Notification : September 22, 2020 • Final Manuscript Due : September 30, 2020 • Publication Date : Determined by the Editor-in-Chief For other details please visit http://airccse.org/journal/ijnlc/index.html Contact Us Here's where you can reach us: ijnlcjournal@airccse.org Submission Link: http://coneco2009.com/submissions/imagination/home.html
